{"id":498420743,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1622011356,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/498420743/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string w1, string w2) {\n        int m = w1.size();\n        int n = w2.size();\n        int dp[m+1][n+1];\n        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            dp[i][0]=i;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            dp[0][i]=i;\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){\n                if(w1[i-1]==w2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j],min(dp[i][j-1],dp[i-1][j-1]))+1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
